title: The Kiss Girl
description: When Charlotte breaks up with her cheating boyfriend, she escapes to Paris to forget about men and to rekindle her relationship with her Aunt Mathilde. But when Mathilde falls ill, it's up to Charlotte to save the family pastry shop, and one particularly difficult (but oh-so-charming) customer turns her relaxing vacation into a summer she won't forget.
author: Ella Walters
